AI Description: BoTorch is a library for Bayesian optimization built on PyTorch. It provides a modular and scalable approach to Bayesian optimization, including state-of-the-art methods for acquisition functions, models, and optimizers, all implemented in PyTorch.
Core Features: Modular & Scalable Approach To Bayesian Optimization, State-Of-The-Art Methods For Acquisition Functions, Models, & Optimizers, Implemented In Pytorch For Seamless Integration With Deep Learning Workflows
